oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Construction of the U.S. Post Office in Sparta, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sparta Post Office during construction as a Works Progress Administration (WPA) project.
Use historical note about WPA from Gov. McAlister/Pres. Roosevelt correspondence.
